short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Concise summaries and breakdowns of any web page and the company behind it with our AI web assistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't waste time surfing through a website trying to understand what's it all about. Receive a comprehensive but condensed breakdown of any web page as well as insights into who the website is about. This AI driven Chrome extension will summarise all content on a web page presenting you with a concise overview of the page without you ever having to scroll through.
